name: client
description: - Home Page:                 - Shows Today's matches (if any)                 - Shows Upcoming matches (if any)                 - Shows current active Tournaments (if any)                 - Shows upcoming tournaments (if any)             - Tournament Page:                 - displays current active tournament's result and schedule                 - shows past tournament results         ### Admin:             - Home Page:                 - Shows Today's matches (if any)                 - Shows Upcoming matches (if any)                 - Shows current active Tournaments (if any)                 - Shows upcoming tournaments (if any)             - Tournament Page:                 - displays current active tournament's result and schedule                 - shows past tournament results                 - create tournament             - Match Page:                 - create Match             - Results Page:                 - update match results                 - update tournament results             - Players Page:                 - create, update and delete player info             - Teams Page:                 - create, update and delete teams
